name: Monsterra MAG
description: Monsterra is a "Free play and earn", multi-chain game run on both BNB, Avalanche and Terra networks. Reaching 40,000 gamers after 1st week launching, 3,000 gamers at average CCU, Monsterra rockets to be on Top GameFi project on BNB (By DappRadar). The game sets foot in a fictional world and revolves around farming, property building, and battling with other lands with the magical creatures named Mongen. The MAGâ€™s total max supply is uncapped, but an intelligent in-game burning mechanism regulates its supply. MAG can be earned (minted) through quest completion and spent (burned) through multiple gaming activities.
